seg.quote: This ruling came as a surprise to everyone.
‘Why don't you tell me?’—‘Because I want it to be a surprise.’

sense.def:
Surprise
je občutek, ki nas prevzame, ko se zgodi nekaj nepričakovanega.

seg.quote: Boylan looked at her in surprise.
To my surprise, he nodded and agreed.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
surprises someone
, se zgodi, ne da bi človek to pričakoval.

seg.quote: I surprised everyone by gobbling an enormous lunch.
It would not surprise me if he ends up in jail.

sense.def:
To surprise someone
pomeni napasti nekoga ali najti nekoga v trenutku, ko tega ne pričakuje.

seg.quote: They were surprised by a unit of US marines during the night.
She feared her parents would return and surprise them.
